name: Gully's Quest
description:
Gully's Quest is an adventure/puzzle game starring Gully and his backpack. Gully must find his backpack to allow him to open cabinets, use phones, as well as use terminals. Once the backpack is on, time begins to countdown and once the clock strikes zero, the entire level randomizes itself.

During this time, Gully must find the crystal and return it to it's holder. But, watch out, the Time Gremlins are there to cause nothing but problems. 

Use the Arrow Keys to move Gully.

Use spacebar to interact with objects.

Use Q and E to rotate the camera if you're having issues.
